item.title: AT&T to Buy Spectrum Licenses From EchoStar for $23 Billion in Cash; Dish, Sling Not Affected
item.description: Charlie Ergen’s EchoStar inked a deal with AT&T to sell a total of 50 MHz of nationwide spectrum for about $23 billion, subject to regulatory approval. AT&T and EchoStar, the parent of D
